actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for higher education expenses.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction, under the Internal Revenue Code, for higher education expenses. Defines such allowable expenses. Reduces such allowable expenses by the amount received as scholarships and veterans benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for higher education expenses.
